name: Alert Intrusion
description:
SURVIVAL MAYHEM

Controlling a spaceship, your goal is to dodge the attacks that are sent on the map. From rays of light to random missiles, boomerang projectiles to scanning fields, each type of enemy has a unique ace up its sleeves.

BIGGER THREATS AHEAD

To complete a stage, you need to achieve 5 keys and survive for 2 minutes, however keys start to appear when a boss joins the battle. To help you gain a upper hand, various items spawn regularly, giving protection or slowing enemy attacks

ENDLESS RACE TOWARDS THE END

By playing the main mode Infiltration and completing multiple stages in succession, more enemies may spawn and the game speed increases. Losing might turn you down, but you can spend coins collected while playing to not lose your progress, or you can learn more about the enemy by playing Practise Mode to complete a stage individually
